name: Rajiv Hossain
about: One of the leading business personnel of kc lingerie ltd. Highly experienced in marketing, business & management. Excellent capacity to increase business by maintain trend & world economy. Likes to share experience with subordinate to develop their skill & to being excellent business personnel.

name: Sholayman Kabir
about: Highly experienced in human resource, compliance, ethics & management. Excellent capability to handle any unexpected situation. Always ready to face any kind of audit with excellence. Highly capable to connect with people in a while
